Sentencas: Present challenges forfuel cell (FC) commercialisation are related to the material and system limitations, delaying the FC market.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: Most intensive interests currently for the FCs are concentrated on the polymer electroyte fuel cells (PEFCs) and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: Due to the material constraint the SOFC system has to be operated at high temperature, e.g., 1000 degreesC, resulting in expensive SOFC system and complex technology; while the noble platinum catalyst has to be used for the PEFCs, creating a bottleneck for its commercialisation.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: In addition, the PEFC system has limited applications due to a shortage of the fuel flexibility, e.g., for hydrocarbon fuels, existing commonly in present fuel infrastructure.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: There is therefore a need to develop new generation or universal FC system, which can be employed for various applications for both mobile, e.g., electrical vehicles, and stationary, e.g., power generation plant.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: These request an advanced FC system that should possess of the wide fuel flexibility, i.e., fitting to various present hydrocarbon fiiels, and most importantly, this FC system should be cost-effective and marketable.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: However the present FC systems themselves alone are difficult to meet these demands due to the, material and system limitations.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: Our strategy is to develop a new advanced or near universal FC system to combine technological advantage from present FC systems to create a new competitive vis-a-vis FC technology.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: To realise this strategy a key issue is addressed from the material point of view.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)

Sentencas: , This paper thus reviews recent developments/progresses and achievements/applications for R&D on the materials and ITSOFCs, more concerned on the new material-based ITSOFCs.
Titulo: New generation or universal fuel cell system? R&D for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFCs)
